text:
Fullstack & Devops Engineer| Harington | Tunisia
February 2023 – Present
• Contribution to an open-source project for a "low code" generation tool entitled "leto-modelizer" using JavaScript,
VueJs and open-source JavaScript libraries.
• Design and development of plugins for the "leto-modelizer" concerning devops tools "gitlab-ci" and "terraform".
• Definition of the plugin components: "metadata", implementation of the "parser" (part responsible for transforming
graphical components into textual code) and "renderer" (part responsible for converting text into graphical
components, based on a defined grammar), using JavaScript and the Antlr, Lidy and Nunjuks libraries.
•Implementation of unit tests using the Jest library.
• Code review for other plugins created as part of the "leto-modelizer" project.
• Set up and maintain ci/cd chains for projects based on "Microservices" architecture using Docker, Jenkins, k8s, Helm,
Microsoft Azure.
Technologies: - JavaScript, VueJs, Antlr, Nunjuks, Lidy, Git and Jest.
 - Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Jenkins and Microsoft Azure.
